channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Rare October storm brings heavy rain and possible mudslides to Southern California
item.description: Southern California is getting hit by a rare October storm that’s pummeling the region with heavy rain and heavy winds. Mudslides are possible Tuesday.

item.title: ICE’s use of full-body restraints during deportations raises concerns over inhumane treatment
Pennsylvania man pleads guilty in arson attack at governor’s mansion while Shapiro’s family slept
